title: Gorseinon stabbing: Two teens arrested after boy injured
article: Two teenagers have been arrested after a 14-year-old boy was stabbed. South Wales Police officers were called to Gorseinon Bus Station on West Street, Swansea, shortly after 18:05 GMT on Thursday. The boy had suffered stab wounds and was taken to the University Hospital of Wales in Cardiff where he is in a stable but critical condition, police said. Two boys, aged 14 and 15, have been arrested on suspicion of assault.
